name: Sentinel (itch) (Balddog123)
description:
A darkness consumes the world and your little town of Coolridge. There are a few who hold a power of light. These are called Sentinels. Free your town from going dark!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse - Primary Ability
  • Right Mouse - Secondary Ability
  • Left Control - Sneak
  • Escape - Pause

If things get too challenging, go to the Main Menu and try the practice level to get acquainted with the controls and classes.

Sentinel Classes

There are 4 Sentinel classes to choose from. You can level up each class by collecting power ups from each location.

When you are at the map, select 1 of the first 4 classes from the bottom right panel. There are:

  1. Emitter: 
    1. Shoots projectiles as a primary ability
    2. Shoots a ball of explosive light as a secondary ability.
  2. Wisp: 
    1. Turn into an immaterial wisp as a primary ability.
    2. Press and hold the secondary ability to charge up an area attack.
  3. Light Knight: 
    1. Uses a short ranged melee attack which can be empowered after dashing with the secondary ability.
    2. Dash towards the mouse and empower your next melee attack.
  4. Tank:
    1. Short ranged punch as a primary ability.
    2. Press and hold the secondary ability to hold up a shield. You will take reduced damage and "store" it while shielded. After 3 seconds of shielding, the "stored" damage will fire towards the mouse. (The more you get hit, the more damage this will deal!)
